alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 18 at 3:18AM CDT until October 18 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A RED FLAG WARNING IS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON FOR SOUTHERN MOBILE AND BALDWIN COUNTIES IN ALABAMA, THE WESTERN FLORIDA PANHANDLE, AND PARTS OF INTERIOR SOUTH CENTRAL ALABAMA DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS AROUND 15 MPH, AND HIGH ERC AND KBDI VALUES... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHERN MOBILE AND BALDWIN COUNTIES IN ALABAMA AND THE WESTERN FLORIDA PANHANDLE... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 201, 202, 203, 204, 205, 206, 263, 264, 265 and 266. * WINDS...North around 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 17 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal
